title: Definitions
context: [ยง663A-1] Definitions. As used in this chapter, unless the context otherwise requires: &ldquo;Mercantile establishment&rdquo; means any place where merchandise is displayed, held, or offered for sale at retail. &ldquo;Merchandise&rdquo; means all things movable and capable of manual delivery. &ldquo;Owner&rdquo; means any person who owns or operates a mercantile establishment or the agents or employees of that person. &ldquo;Shoplifting&rdquo; means the specific type of theft offense defined in section 708-830(8). [L 1985, c 275, pt of ยง1]
